bookSourceComment:
标签屏蔽在 搜索 和 发现 屏蔽相关标签书籍
标签说明https://www.uaa.com/novel/tags
(可以 搜索地址 修改separator的值为你觉得输入方便的字符，默认为@@ )
搜索时可使用  关键词@@标签  来进行附加标签搜索。 前面为搜索的关键词 ，@@后面的是标签，多个标签之间用 逗号( ,， )隔开。
关键词留空可直接搜索标签
exploreUrl:
<js>
//分类 category
let categoryList = [
	{
		title: "都市激情",
		type: "都市激情"
	},
	{
		title: "校园春色",
		type: "校园春色"
	},
	{
		title: "乡村爱情",
		type: "乡村爱情"
	},
	{
		title: "系统异能",
		type: "系统异能"
	},
	{
		title: "家庭乱伦",
		type: "家庭乱伦"
	},
	{
		title: "穿越重生",
		type: "穿越重生"
	},
	{
		title: "经典武侠",
		type: "经典武侠"
	},
	{
		title: "同人改编",
		type: "同人改编"
	},
	{
		title: "科学幻想",
		type: "科学幻想"
	},
	{
		title: "东方玄幻",
		type: "东方玄幻"
	},
	{
		title: "娱乐明星",
		type: "娱乐明星"
	},
	{
		title: "历史架空",
		type: "历史架空"
	},
	{
		title: "西方魔幻",
		type: "西方魔幻"
	},
	{
		title: "贤者小说",
		type: "贤者小说"
	},
]
//状态 finished
let statusList = [
	{
		title: '全部',
		type: ""
	},
	{
		title: '已完结',
		type: 1
	},
	{
		title: '连载中',
		type: 0
	}
]
//篇幅 space
let spaceList = [
	{
		title: '全部',
		type: ''
	},
	{
		title: '短篇',
		type: 1
	},
	{
		title: '中篇',
		type: 2
	},
	{
		title: '长篇',
		type: 3
	}
]

let list = [];
formatUrl = (space, category, finished) => {
	return `/api/novel/app/novel/search?category=${category}&finished=${finished}&space=${space}&excludeTags={{getExcludeTags();}}&size=40&page={{page}}`;
}
pushItem = (title, url, basis) => {
	list.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
			layout_flexGrow: 1,
			layout_flexBasisPercent: basis
		}
	});
}

for (spaceItem of spaceList) {
	pushItem(`篇幅（${spaceItem.title}）`, "", 1);
	for (categoryItem of categoryList) {
		statusList[0].title = categoryItem.title;
		for (statusItem of statusList) {
			pushItem(`${statusItem.title}`, formatUrl(spaceItem.type,categoryItem.type,statusItem.type), 0.25);
		}
	}
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
	let loginName = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("邮箱");
	let password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
	if (loginName && password) {
		let body = `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/login';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responseBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responseBody.result == "fail") {
			throw new Error(responseBody.msg)
		} else {
			let header = JSON.stringify({
				"token": responseBody.model.token,
				"uaa-userid": responseBody.model.id,
			});
			source.putLoginHeader(header);
		}
	}
}
//账号注册
function registerAccount() {
	let loginName = result.get("邮箱");
	let password = result.get("密码");
	let checkCode = result.get("邮箱验证码");
	if (loginName && password && checkCode) {
		let body =  `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}&nickName=&checkCode=${checkCode}&recommendCode=`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/register';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responeBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responeBody.msg) {
			java.toast(responeBody.msg);
			java.log(responeBody.msg);
		}
	}
}
//获取验证码
function getVerificationCode() {
	let loginName = result.get("邮箱");
	if (loginName) {
		let body = `email=${loginName}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/sendCheckCode';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responeBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responeBody.msg) {
			java.toast(responeBody.msg);
			java.log(responeBody.msg);
		}
	}
}

function searchExcludeTags() {
	let excludeTags = this.getExcludeTags();
	//java.log(`当前标签屏蔽：${excludeTags}`);
	java.longToast(`当前标签屏蔽：${excludeTags}`);
}

function resetExcludeTags() {
	let data = getData();
	data.ExcludeTags = [];
	setData(data);
	//java.log("标签屏蔽已重置");
	java.toast("标签屏蔽已重置");
}

function setExcludeTags(tag) {
	let data = getData();
	if (!data.ExcludeTags) data.ExcludeTags = [];
	let index = data.ExcludeTags.findIndex(item => item == tag);
	if (index == -1) {
		data.ExcludeTags.push(tag);
	} else {
		data.ExcludeTags.splice(index, 1);
	}
	//java.log(`标签 ${tag} 已${index == -1 ? "添加": "移除" }屏蔽`);
	java.toast(`标签 ${tag} 已${index == -1 ? "添加": "移除" }屏蔽`);
	setData(data);
}
</js>

<js>

`　　最新更新：${$.latestUpdate}(${$.updateTimeFormat})

评分：${Number($.score).toFixed(2)}

`
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
$ = JSON.parse(result);
reuslt = $.model.lines.join("\n");
//未登录
if($.msg) reuslt += '\n' + $.msg;
reuslt
</js>

<js>

  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
      source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
      java.toast("请按照规则修改源变量，已重置源变量！")
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
    source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
  }
  let header = {
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; MI 8 Lite Build/QKQ1.190910.002) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/113.0.5672.62 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "ismobile": 0
  }
  if(variable.cookie){
    header.cookie = variable.cookie;
  }
  JSON.stringify(header)
</js>

ruleBookInfo.kind: <js>let data = JSON.parse(src).page; let tag; switch(data.status){case 0: tag = "完结";break;case 4: tag = "完结";break;case 1: tag = "连载中";break;case -1: tag = "已断更";break;default: tag =  "已下架";} let tags = JSON.parse(data.categoryV2); tags = tags.map((t) => {return t.Name}); tags.unshift(tag); tags</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = `https://fanqienovel.com/reader/${c.itemId}?enter_from=page&force_mobile=0`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

bookSourceComment: 做完发现书籍下载地址都404了😭

自己花了差不多一下午做出来的，第一次做的书源。特此发出来给自己纪念一下，也不算是完全自己做的吧。这个书源之前有大佬做了一下那个发现，只做了一个那个最新那个列表，其他的都是我看着关耳大佬的视频和那个规则自己一边抄一边写下来的。那个发现列表里面的那些规则是我把直接把源代码给了AI之后，然后再给他那个格式，让他照着格式给我写出来的！还有那个搜索，不知道为啥我做到一半之前好好的，然后突然又搜不出来了，可能之前的大佬也是因为搜不出来所以就没有做搜索那个规则吧？我自己照着关耳大佬的视频抄的不知道什么时候失效，失效了也不要找我，因为我真的是个小白，我也不会改。
                                        ——特此纪念
                                   ——by.Lai

	url=base+url;
	list.push({"text":lis[i].text(),"href":url})
}
list
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> 
//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>
